snippet.title: Nintendo 64 Longplay [045] Neon Genesis Evangelion
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

This game is based on the anime that covers religious references, mecha robots and teenage girls. It covers most of the battles from the Evangelion anime and anime series.

This longplay is played on hard mode, because on easy and medium you don't get to see all of the levels and the final ending. The easy mode ends at mission 12, and the medium mode at mission 12.5.

00:00:04 Intro
00:02:01 Simulation mode
00:12:24 Mission 1: Sachiel
00:20:24 Mission 2: Shamshel
00:26:17 Mission 3: Ramiel
00:29:39 Mission 4: Jet Alone
00:33:34 Mission 5: Israphel
00:38:39 Mission 6: Sandalphon
00:42:25 Mission 7: Sahaquiel
00:46:12 Mission 8: Bardiel
00:52:17 Mission 9: Zeruel
00:56:10 Mission 10: Arael
00:58:53 Mission 11: Tabris
01:03:38 Mission 12: Military Forces/MP Evas
01:12:06 Mission 13: MP Evas
01:16:37 Hard mode ending

Other endings are added after the longplay:

01:21:33 Medium mode ending
01:23:49 Easy mode ending -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
